fields.text: Welcome to Pramp, based in San Francisco, your platform for live coding interview practice.
For individual coding interview scheduling and support, press [INDEX].
To schedule or reschedule a mock interview session, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our scheduling team.
For technical assistance with your account or session, press [INDEX].
One moment please, we are connecting you to technical support.
For corporate training and enterprise solutions, press [INDEX].
To learn about enterprise plans and bulk licensing, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we retrieve information about our enterprise offerings.
To speak with our corporate sales team, press [INDEX].
Thank you for your patience; we are now connecting you to a corporate sales representative.
